short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An IZI-IT extension for Chrome to easily create maintenance periods in Zabbix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your Zabbix maintenance scheduling process with the Zabbix Maintenance Scheduler Chrome Extension!
This intuitive and powerful extension is designed to streamline the creation and management of maintenance periods directly from your Chrome browser.
